tool_description: Youtube API for search, videos, channels, trending, recommendation
name: Youtube V2
title: Youtube V2

api_list.name: Audio Videos
api_list.description: Get the latest video published under an audio

api_list.name: Audio Details
api_list.description: This endpoint get available details about a given audio

api_list.name: Channel Videos
api_list.description: Get the latest videos published by a Youtube channel

api_list.name: Youtube Channel ID
api_list.description: This endpoint get the channel ID of a Youtube Channel given the channel name

schema.title: ChannelId
schema.description: Schema Class for Youtube Channel ID

api_list.name: Channel Search
api_list.description: This endpoint gets search results in a given Youtube channel using the channel ID

api_list.name: Channel Details
api_list.description: This endpoint get all available details about a given channel ID

api_list.name: Channel Shorts
api_list.description: Get the latest shorts published by a Youtube channel

api_list.name: Video Recommendation
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of recommended videos based on a given a video ID

api_list.name: Video Comments
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list comments under a given Youtube video

api_list.name: Video Subtitles
api_list.description: Get the available subtitles of a Youtube Video

api_list.name: Video Details
api_list.description: Get all publicly available details about a Youtube Video

schema.title: Video
schema.description: Schema Class for a Youtube video

api_list.name: Video Data
api_list.description: Get downloadable links of the Video

api_list.name: Youtube Search
api_list.description: This endpoint will a specific number of videos for a specific keyword, note that the maximum is 40 videos per request

api_list.name: Trending Videos
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the list of trending videos given a country
